title: Learn TypeScript Course
description: Comprehensive course covering TypeScript fundamentals including types, functions, complex types, union types, type narrowing, and advanced object types. Enhanced JavaScript skills with type system for more reliable and maintainable code.

title: Learn Python for Data Science Skill Path
description: Comprehensive skill path covering Python programming for data science, including pandas, data cleaning, transformation, and analysis using Jupyter Notebook. Completed hands-on projects with real datasets.

title: Learn React Course
description: Comprehensive course covering React fundamentals including JSX, components, props, state, hooks, and React programming patterns. Built interactive applications and learned modular development approach for powerful web applications.

title: Introduction to AI
description: Internationally recognized course covering the fundamentals and practical applications of artificial intelligence, including machine learning, neural networks, and ethical considerations.

title: Graphic Design Foundations: Layout and Composition
description: Course on core design principles, focusing on layout, visual hierarchy, balance, alignment, and effective use of space to create compelling and structured designs.

title: AWS Security Best Practices
description: Training on best practices for securing AWS cloud environments.

title: Architecting on AWS
description: Course on designing and deploying scalable, secure applications on AWS.

title: AWS Technical Essentials Day
description: Overview of AWS products, services, and common solutions.

title: Developing on AWS
description: Course on developing and deploying applications using AWS services.

title: React.js Essential Training
description: Essential training in React.js, covering core concepts and practical application development.

title: Continuous Delivery with GitLab
description: Course on implementing continuous delivery pipelines using GitLab.

title: Learning GitLab
description: Introduction to GitLab for version control and DevOps workflows.

title: Digital Transformation
description: Course on digital transformation strategies and best practices.

title: Digital Transformation Tips
description: Tips and insights for successful digital transformation initiatives.

title: C# Design Patterns: Part 1
description: Introduction to design patterns in C# for building robust applications.

title: Introduction to AWS for Non-Engineers: 3 Core Services
description: Overview of core AWS services for non-engineers.

title: AWS Security Best Practices for Developers
description: Security best practices for developers working with AWS.

title: Scrum Master
description: Certification validating Scrum Master skills and agile leadership.
